marklogic.body:
Like John McCain, Mitt Romney is electable. The democrats will like him as they vote for Obama which he will have Gained at the cost of the voters that will not be voting for anybody.
On Communism, have you noticed that leftist movements are aristocratic? Everything that the leftist falls for is an excuse for us to fall back into the secular ages and return to aristocratic rule. Leftists are simply exercising their Itching ears.
